text: The Gran Puerto de Cancún Lighthouse is the tallest in Mexico This is a list of lighthouses in Mexico. They are located along the Pacific, Gulf of Mexico, and Caribbean coastlines of the country. These are named landfall lights, or those with a range of over fifteen nautical miles. ==Lighthouses== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- bgcolor="#dfdfdf" !
